title: Sister, Sister Split, Cuffing Season, Marri(Separate)ed Houses, Shirley's Handbags and more.
itunes:title: Sister, Sister Split, Cuffing Season, Marri(Separate)ed Houses, Shirley's Handbags and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Kanye West and Candace Owens are trippin' in Paris.  Here is a taste of Would You Rather.  Week with no soap or no toothbrush?  Mr. Ready to Love and Junior are here to address arguments over trash cans that lead to public disrespect.  We get a hella tricky question coming in about being married while living in separate homes.  Which Sister from 'Sister, Sister' is heading for Splitsville?  Slow Boogie in for Pimpin' and he talkin' 'bout Russell Wilson and Ciara.  Click here for advice and tips for cuffing season.  Our girl Shirley has a new line of handbags just for the ladies.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the ways life tests your will.  There are two specific instances he mentions.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
